PerfectNetExp.abs: 修辞手法有哪几种？ ... 15．共轭支配法（ zeugma） 16．说话中断法（ aposiopesis） 18．夸张法（ hyperbole）.
...repetition)八拈连(zeugma)九跳脱(aposiopesis)十省略(ellipsis)十一引用(quotation)十二呼语(apostrophe)……
C．顿绝法（aposiopesis）是句子的一部分刻意省略，以为强调。在约翰福音一章22节，犹太人的代表问施洗约翰：「你是谁？[我 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek aposiōpēsis, from oposiōpan 'be silent'

means.word_mean: 1. breaking off in the middle of a sentence (as by writers of realistic conversations)

auth_sentence.content: But aposiopesis is important in literature because of its colloquial humanness.
auth_sentence.res_content: But aposiopesis is important in literature because of its colloquial humanness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But aposiopesis is important in literature because of its colloquial humanness.

auth_sentence.content: We used to laugh over aposiopesis in Latin class because it seemed disarmingly colloquial for a sea god to talk like that.
